transcript: is, how to say something particularly agreeable before going away. Besides this he was absent- minded. When he rose to go, he took up in- stead of his own, the general's three-cornered hat, and held it, pulling at the plume, till the general asked him to restore it. All his absent- mindedness and inability to enter a room and converse in it was, however, redeemed by his kindly, simple, and modest expression.
